Articles.Content:
Color me impressed. That's a really smart solution.

Hype train m8
Lander IVA is in game and functional with RPM support. Shryq if you get that rescale done I can have it all packaged up and release today!
Soooo awesome! This is literally the best mod ever! Thanks guys!

I'm having some balancing issues with the ranger when low on fuel it tilts forward when vtol is engaged and I just think it runs out to quickly. Also is the front landing gear sepose to be white? That said I love you guys thanks for taking your time and make this very epic mod

made a simple lazarus lander

https://www.dropbox.com/s/q6g8drdm8g9jrkq/lazaruslander.blend?dl=0

If you want to get a release done today, you can scale the ranger yourself. Changing the RescaleFactor in the configs is enough. I'm working on jury-rigging a better RCS system.

Also going to put some kind of texture on those landing legs so I stop getting that question.

Edited February 17, 2015 by Shryq

I'll wait until the RCS is done. Otherwise we're bound to get loads of people saying it's broken or something haha!

Looks good xxhansonmaxx!

Update is up!

L4rg3Singularity, I used your screenshots on the Kerbalstuff page!

Alright, alright, alright!

This mod looks so cool!

To bad I cant play this today.

I can only play on the weekends.

made a simple lazarus lander

*snip*

This must be.

also, if it comes with a robot in any potential IVA, could it be named MACY?

We still interested in an updated model? The differences are subtle but I like it. More streamlined. The textures are a bit weird due to the way I changed the model. Anything that should be straight is, it's just the textures that are messed up.

I also figured out a way that we can get rid of the RCS as a separate part, keep the cool-weird-angled-port visual and still get cardinal axis RCS centered on the CoM.

Edited February 17, 2015 by Shryq
That looks badass! But please dont forget the solar panels, I think it will really give it alittle extra

Honestly I don't think it's needed, if anything the nose looks a bit too thin in the new version from what I can see but if you want to redo it then go ahead.

Anyway I'm going to be taking some time out from this for a while since I need to focus on IRL stuff. Hope you guys understand & enjoy the current version!
I think somewhere in between those two is the correct width

Phone pics of concept art book to the rescue!

http://imgur.com/sZggdf8

Update is up!

L4rg3Singularity, I used your screenshots on the Kerbalstuff page!

can u give me the files for the endurance command pods so I can make the IVA?

slight problem detected:

[LOG 16:34:44.068] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'Endurance/Parts/RANGER/Parts/rangerEngineleft/rangerEngineLeft'
[LOG 16:34:44.092] Added sound_rocket_hard to FXGroup running
[LOG 16:34:44.093] Added sound_explosion_low to FXGroup flameout
[ERR 16:34:44.097] Part: Cannot add attach node. Transform of name 'leftEngineNode_eng'

My loading process stalled at that spot.

Update is up!

L4rg3Singularity, I used your screenshots on the Kerbalstuff page!

Thanks bro
The op says there are duel modes for the ranger. Is there really? Doesn't show up in the changelog.

The op says there are duel modes for the ranger. Is there really? Doesn't show up in the changelog.

No, not that I'm aware of.

slight problem detected:
[LOG 16:34:44.068] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'Endurance/Parts/RANGER/Parts/rangerEngineleft/rangerEngineLeft'
[LOG 16:34:44.092] Added sound_rocket_hard to FXGroup running
[LOG 16:34:44.093] Added sound_explosion_low to FXGroup flameout

My loading process stalled at that spot.

Did this happen once or multiple times?

No, not that I'm aware of.

Did this happen once or multiple times?

The VTOL is weird, the ranger would rotate down and yeah.

- - - Updated - - -

Nevermind.

In case anybody missed it (or I might just be late), the interactive Endurance on the official movie site now has interiors for the Ranger, docking hub, hab modules, and the CM. I'm assuming they will eventually add the cryo lab and Lander. You can move around in each interior on-rails and pan the camera around to get a better look. Might help with the IVAs?

Hab module

Ranger

CM
we knew this since page 3...
Ah, thought it didn't have the interiors back then. My bad.

Did this happen once or multiple times?

Okay, so I admit I didn't have the time to see if it happened again. It's a stall on the loading process, and quite far into it too. That takes a lot of spare time and, as a student, I have less of that than I'd like. I suppose we'll see what happens.

- - - Updated - - -

we knew this since page 3...

Well I didn't, so that's awesome.
